welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Carmel! Known for its picturesque beaches, art galleries, and beautiful architecture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this incredible city has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Carriage House
restaurants.description: The Carriage House is a american restaurant located in Mahopac.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in Mahopac.
restaurants.address: 969 Route 6 (at E Lake Blvd), Mahopac, NY 10541

restaurants.name: Paulo's Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Paulo's Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Mahopac.

restaurants.name: Ramiro's
restaurants.description: Ramiro's is a latin american restaurant located in Mahopac.

restaurants.name: Arturo's Tavern
restaurants.description: Arturo's Tavern is a italian restaurant located in Mahopac.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mount Comfort Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mount Comfort Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Indianapolis International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Indianapolis International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines and Delta Connection.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Indianapolis International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and mail shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
